Assumptions: Note that most HOV lanes worldwide limit the minimum to 2 or 3 persons per vehicle.

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Polzin & Pisarski (2015) Commuting in America 2013: Brief 5. The Nature and Pattern of Jobs. AASHTO
